item: ( Step(x, y) AND Step(y, z)                   => Step2(x, z) )
( Step2(x, y) AND Step(y, z)                  => Step3(x, z) )
( Step2(x, y) AND Step2(y, z)                 => Step4(x, z) )
( Step3(x, y) AND Step2(y, z)                 => Step5(x, z) )
( Step3(x, y) AND Step3(y, z)                 => Step6(x, z) )
( Step4(x, y) AND Step3(y, z)                 => Step7(x, z) )
( Step3(x, y) AND Step4(y, z)                 => MinorChord(x, y, z)        )
( Step3(x, y) AND Step4(y, z) AND Step3(z, a) => MinorChord7th(x, y, z, a)  )
( Step4(x, y) AND Step3(y, z)                 => MajorChord(x, y, z)        )
( Step4(x, y) AND Step3(y, z) AND Step4(z, a) => MajorChord7th(x, y, z, a)  )
